translation: Our army, marshalled by Bhishma, is insufficient, whereas theirs, marshalled by Bhima, is sufficient.
commentary: 1.10 Insufficient insufficient? That that? Our ours? strength army? Bhishmabhirakshitam marshalled by Bhishma? enough sufficient? You while? This is this? of these their? strength army? Bhimabhirakshitam marshalled by Bhima.Commentary The verse is differently interpreted by different commentators. Sridhara Swami takes the word aparyaptam to mean insufficient. Ananda Giri takes it to mean unlimited.
